name: Tiger
quote:
The power of your Art projects itself like a shadow.
Sense your opponent's fear and pounce with certainty and strength.

name: Crab
quote:
Move with your opponent's movements, as if you are the never ceasing tide.
When the time is right, he will fall prey to your attack.

name: Monkey
quote:
Without deception you cannot carry out strategy,
without strategy you cannot control the opponent.

name: Crane
quote:
Make no unnecessary movement, conserving your strength until the time
is right to strike. The true Art is a symphony of graceful strikes.

name: Dragon
quote:
Be swift as the thunder that peals before you have a chance to cover your ears,
fast as the lightning that flashes before you can blink your eyes.

name: Elephant
quote:
Only the strong may pursue your Art. This is why it is the true Art,
the Art that cannot be stopped.

name: Mantis
quote:
Your opponent sees, but does not understand. Distract the watchful, misguide
the wary. This is the Art of the Mantis, the Art of the deceptive strike.

name: Boar
quote:
Watch for opportunity, for it will present itself. Then strike, focusing all your
might into a single rush, trampling your opponent's Art under your own.

name: Frog
quote:
Do not fail to learn from the pure voice of an ever-flowing mountain stream
splashing over the rocks. Emulate its flow, mimic its power.

name: Goose
quote:
Your robes are your cloak of feathers; spread your wings to hide your intentions.
Even then, as your opponent seeks to determine your motive, you shall strike.

name: Horse
quote:
Lose yourself in the rhythm of your Art. At times be swift and decisive,
at other times measured and taunting.

name: Eel
quote:
If your opponent strikes with fire, counter with water,
becoming completely fluid and freeflowing.

name: Rabbit
quote:
Be near to your opponent, blinding him with your speed.
The Art of the Rabbit is the Art of speed.

name: Rooster
quote:
Do not allow your enemy to rest, but focus your Art
to deliver quick, sharp strikes whenever he lags.

name: Ox
quote:
Put your strength into the forms of Art -
in its punches, its kicks, in the steady advance of your aggression.

name: Cobra
quote:
Attack violently when your opponents are not expecting it -
show leisure in the beginning, then suddenly attack vigorously.

name: Giraffe
quote:
Project your power, vaulting at opponents who believe themselves
safely out of range. Aggression is subservient to surprise.

name: Kirin
quote:
There is Art in grace, Art in discernment, Art in sensing the truth. Pierce the veil
of the shadow, and strike your opponent from a place of enlightenment.

name: Phoenix
quote:
No opponent expects that which he believes is not there. Harness the
shadows, bend the sun, strike as the wind - from a place unseen.

name: Turtle
quote:
Within your sphere of power, your Art remains supreme.
Engage your opponent and deflect his strikes.

name: Fox
quote: Harry your opponent through your Art, give him no time to think, less time to act.

name: Panda
quote:
Your opponent watches for your complacency, so show it to him. Lull him into an
attack, then unleash your Art when he has already committed to his attack.

name: Sea Snake
quote:
There is no movement or opportunity wasted. Strike where you are not
expected, flow where your opponent believes you cannot be.

name: Mouse
quote:
All opponents have a hole in their Art, an opening of weakness.
The Art of the Mouse is to find that opening, enter it, and strike.

name: Tanuki
quote:
The Art of the Tanuki is the art of opportunity.
Patience will open the door to the perfect angle of your strike.

name: Sable
quote:
Be fluid, and control the battlefield with constant movement
and precision strikes.

name: Dog
quote:
Deny your opponent his Art. Once you have blocked his attack,
do not let him go, but instead, relentlessly hamper his momentum.

name: Bear
quote:
Defend your ground. Do not be like those fools who are quick to run to attack from
another position. They have lost the fight because they have already run from it.

name: Viper
quote: The Art of the Viper is to strike in the Moment. This is the true Art.

name: Rat
quote:
Your opponent cannot attack what he cannot predict.
Let your movements be immediate, your attacks be unexpected.

name: Iguana
quote:
While your opponents wears himself out with unnecessary movement, you will
gather your strength. A devastating sweep or fatal punch is the pinnacle of the Art.

name: Otter
quote:
Who can stop the flowing stream? The Art of the Otter is the Art of Power,
knocking away the advances of the opponent through sustained, powerful strikes.

name: Goat
quote:
Strategy flows from the mind. Deny your opponents clear thought through strikes
at their head and eyes, and their strategy will fail, providing the chance to strike.

name: Sheep
quote:
Follow your opponent's movements, shadow his forms. The Art of the Sheep is the
art of knowing, and of using your opponent's strengths against his weaknesses.

name: Centipede
quote:
Mesmerize your opponent with many movements. Your real attack
will come unexpectedly.

name: Hornet
quote:
Distract your opponent from above while striking from below.
Your venom will weaken their fortitude.

name: Cat
quote: Avoidance can lead to victory as much as aggression.

name: Serow
quote: Knowing when to dodge is key to overcoming obstacles.

name: Lobster
quote: Your Art must be both fluid and precise, like the convergence of Ocean and Air.

name: Steer
quote:
Your Art comes from your core; only with nourished stomach
will you find the strength to conquer your adversaries.

name: Butterfly
quote: Let the wind carry your strikes fiercely.

name: Moth
quote: Strike your opponent from the darkness pushing them into the light.

name: Mejika
quote:
A gentle spirit is often seen as weakness, but it is not so.
Show your foes the power of underestimating humility.

name: Okija
quote: Charge with conviction and string with the aged weapon of experience.

name: Kumo
quote:
Every movement must be part of a plan. The opponent does not know it,
but they will see it when it has caught them in defeat.

name: Sasori
quote:
Strike swiftly. Strike precisely. Strike with such confidence that
your foe will weaken before you have touched them.
